!Warehouse Freightman Rant: An excellent decision, to have selected us, the Iron Gate. If you entrust your freight with us, you can collect them at this warehouse only. [npc_%objectId%_Chat 1|Use the Cargo Service] [npc_%objectId%_Quest|Quest]
